Text:
Thanks!

and "Paris in Love" by Eloisa James.
BBS, you're an e=book god! Many thanks.

Great Job. My Sister in law is your biggest fan. She comes to me for new books every day and i tell her, "Let me ask BigBlueSea and see whats new". Could you PLEASE re-up the Tim LaHaye "Left Behind" series...the one from your earlier upload will not pull up in any readers i have tried and i have tried multiple from the Google Store. Thank you for all your hard work and sacrifice...You Rule. Not sure how long you had a Skull, but you deserve it....CONGRATS
Thanks!
Thanks so much for your uploads.  I really have been stuck in genres and your uploads have given me a chance to try new ones.
Thank you.   You rock and rule!!!

Thank you for your all your previous work, I have another request for BBS, as i am badly stuck,
Construction Surveying and Layout, 3rd Edition, By Wesley G. Crawford.
i know that i do not have the time to read all of the books you upload, but I am trying, and I am downloading for a Family of 6, 4 Archos e-readers, and 2 Acer Netbooks.
thank you again.
Thanks for all your epub floods.  Any suggestions on an easy way to index all these books into a single list?

Thank you so much for all your hard work. I'm not gonna lie, I get pretty darn happy when I see a new torrent by you. 
I have a request. or two

 and a good copy of 
 12.21 by Dustin Thomason (the version i found is formatted horribly) 
Just thought I would try. 
Thanks again.

Big  thanks for all your work . Do you have anything on Hugo Chevez, biographies etc.
thanks again

You're doing a fantastic job which I really appreciate.Do you have by any chance books by Philip Kerr (his Bernie Gunther detective series is one of the best series around) and also anything at all by Jim Harrison? Thanks again for your floods.

hugo chavez by nikolas kozloff,
changing venezuala by gregory wilpert,
understanding the venezualan revolution by hugo chavez and marta harnecker.
big  thankyou
Thanks for all the uploads.  Do you happen to have the Yesterday's Gone (serials) by Sean Platt  and David Wright?
Thanks BBSea!

@ibenimble

Due to the ridiculous and growing size of my library,I house my books on my server with a search engine,it's the only way I can house them without being overwhelmed.That's how my books are indexed 

There is software like "Calibre" that you can house your collection in,it's free and works well,I use it to convert books from one format to another.

You might want to google ''Indexing eBooks" to see if you can find something on the subject :)

FANTASTIC job! 
Would love to find Spencer Quinn's - Chet & Bernie series. Especially "A Fistful of Collars", "The Dog Who Knew Too Much". Thanks!

Great work BBS!

Do you have "Anthology of American Literature" 10th Edition, Volume 1 (or consolidated 1/2) McMichael, Leonard, Pearson Publishing
Thanks a million....really appreciate it :-)

@Hghway61

I have the series,except for "A Fistful of Collars"

It was just released today,I should get it soon 

I will upload the rest in flood #25

@Diliji

I'm sorry,I don't have it at the moment
could you also upload Vampire memories by Barb hendee please?

Once again my thanks for the Christian romance  books. Your effort and time truly gives my wife all these books to read as she sits with my son at hospital waiting in surgery for brain tumor. It helps her pass the hours and take her mind off so much when it is needed the most. Ty Ty Ty

@kybluenutt

Your most welcome

If there is a certain book your wife might like don't hesitate to ask,I will see if I have it or can get it.

I also have a son 3 yrs old, I wish your son as well as you and your wife the best,I hope everything goes well and he recovers soon :)
you are awesome!!! anything by Bella Andre if you have any :)
Perhaps "written in bone" by simon beckett please?
BBS ,do you have any Etagr Keret works ???

Hi bligbluesea,

First up, thank you so much for these amazing uploads.  Great work and great spirit of sharing.

The Diary of Ma Yan by Ma Yan and Pierre Haski 
The Secret Life of Bees by Sue Monk Kidd
and
The Middle Kingdom series by David Wingrove

eternal thanks

Interventions for speech sound disorders (communication and language interventions by williams mcleod and mcCauley...
